column2: The Subnet ID for the instance
VPC associated with the provided subnet

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -ex
', u'apt-get update
', u'apt-get install -y golang git unattended-upgrades
', u'# Automatic security updates
', u'cat > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/20auto-upgrades <<EOF
', u'APT::Periodic::Update-Package-Lists "1";
', u'APT::Periodic::Unattended-Upgrade "1";
', u'EOF
', u'export GOPATH=/usr/local
', u'go get ', {u'Ref': u'GoPackage'}, u'
', u'setcap cap_net_bind_service=+ep /usr/local/bin/aws-name-server
', u'cat << EOF > /etc/init/aws-name-server.conf
', u'# upstart script for aws-name-server
', u'description     "AWS Name Server"

', u'start on filesystem or runlevel [2345]
', u'stop on runlevel [!2345]

', u'respawn
', u'respawn limit 10 5
', u'setuid nobody
', u'setgid nogroup

', u'exec /usr/local/bin/aws-name-server --domain ', {u'Ref': u'DnsPrefix'}, u'.', {u'Ref': u'DnsZone'}, u'
EOF

', u'initctl start aws-name-server
']]}}
Existing security group that should be granted administrative access (e.g., 'sg-123456')
Route53-hosted zone to use for the NS record (<prefix>.<zone>)
[{u'ToPort': u'53', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'53'}, {u'ToPort': u'53', u'IpProtocol': u'udp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'53'}]
Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
[{u'SubnetId': {u'Ref': u'SubnetId'}, u'DeviceIndex': u'0', u'GroupSet': [{u'Ref': u'ServerSecurityGroup'}, {u'Ref': u'AdminSecurityGroup'}], u'AssociatePublicIpAddress': u'true'}]
The EC2 AMI (64bit HVM-based EBS-backed Ubuntu 14.04 recommended)
[{u'PolicyName': u'Ec2DescribeInstances', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Statement': [{u'Action': u'ec2:DescribeInstances', u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
